name: Art Rush
description: You are an artist that has an upcoming show to prepare for. Unfortunately for you, the studio that you did your art in has been flooded. Fortunately for you though almost all of your art pieces survive except for your most prized one. Now you must get this  choice right or you will fail.  You look at your calendar, the art show is tomorrow! Will you be able to complete your art pieces before the show begins.  Just use your mouse to make your choice.
